Return the list of the realms and associated biomes and ecoregions.

Source: R/dbFixedNames.R
accRealmNames.Rd

Return the list of the realms and associated biomes and ecoregions.

accRealmNames(realm = NA, ecoregion = TRUE)

Arguments

realm

A name of accepted realm. Default is NA and returns a list of all the biome and ecoregion names sorted by realm.

ecoregion

A boolean to choose whether to get the ecoregions names.

Value

A list with elements that correspond to the biomes (and possibly ecoregions) of each realm.

See also

https://www.worldwildlife.org/publications/terrestrial-ecoregions-of-the-world

Examples

accRealmNames(realm='Africotropical')
#> $Africotropical
#>                                                            biome
#> 1                                   Deserts and xeric shrublands

accRealmNames(realm='Africotropical', ecoregion=FALSE)
#> $Africotropical
#>  [1] "Deserts and xeric shrublands"                                
#>  [2] "Flooded grasslands and savannas"                             
#>  [3] "Lakes"                                                       
#>  [4] "Mangroves"                                                   
#>  [5] "Mediterranean Forests, woodlands and scrubs"                 
#>  [6] "Montane grasslands and shrublands"                           
#>  [7] "Temperate grasslands, savannas and shrublands"               
#>  [8] "Tropical and subtropical dry broadleaf forests"              
#>  [9] "Tropical and subtropical grasslands, savannas and shrublands"
#> [10] "Tropical and subtropical moist broadleaf forests"            
#>
